title: Hero opens its first â€˜Xpulse Xperience Centre'
description: Set up in Bengaluru, the Centre is located in Big Rock Dirt Park and is designed to be a off-road training exercise, for owners of the brand's Xpluse 2004V and enthusiasts. The motorcycle major also plans to launch more in the country.
